featured.text: Some waste from nuclear power plants is buried in ________ containers.
It is your chance to play around with the extraordinary abilities buried in unused parts of your brain.
The dead were buried with onions and onion flowers on or around various 38 of their bodies.

definition.zh_def: 埋葬，將某物放入土中或隱藏起來。
definition.en_def: To place a dead body in the ground, or to hide something underground.
definition.example: They decided to bury their pet in the backyard.
